name: IMS Bank using Ansible

properties.scriptBody:
ls -al
pwd
rm -vrf /opt/ucd/agent/var/work/Ansible\ Infra\ Setup/*
ls -al
mkdir ansible-ucd-bank-of-z
chown ronnieg ./ansible-ucd-bank-of-z
